title: Scotlyn Creutz’s CV
text:
Analytical, Resourceful, Versatile

Scotlynstremebath@Gmail.com | www.linkedin.com/in/scotlyn-creutz-



Looking for my next challenge


Data-Driven Financial Analysis and Automation



Excel, VBA, Python, SQL, DAX, C, Power BI, Tableau, Data Analysis and Visualization




2020 - 2025 Brigham Young University-Idaho. - Bachelor’s Degree of Science, Business Finance - Certificate: Data Science - GPA: 3.6/4.0



April 2025 - Current Finance and Marketing Intern, Thornton, CO - Cleaned and prepared financial datasets for integration into modeling and forecasting software, enhancing data accuracy and usability - Collaborated with third-party marketing teams to organize and standardize incoming campaign data for analysis and reporting - Managed customer databases and coordinated outreach efforts, improving engagement and tracking effectiveness - Developed financial forecasts and built data models to support strategic decision-making and answer key business questions
February 2024 - July 2025 Teacher’s Assistant, Brigham Young University Business Analytics, Professional Writing, Spreadsheet Analysis for Business, Business Statistics - Applied business statistics and analytics, spreadsheet modeling, and professional writing in academic and real-world scenarios to reinforce technical proficiency - Strengthened communication skills by tutoring and mentoring over 20 students per semester, adapting explanations to diverse learning styles
June 2022 - May 2023 Service Center Agent, Mountain America Credit Union - Surpassed monthly sales and customer satisfaction targets by at least 2%, consistently contributing to team performance goals - Developed in-depth knowledge of financial industry operations and products, including a range of investment solutions - Recognized for effectively matching financial products to member needs, enhancing customer satisfaction, and retention
